parameter.name: functionName
parameter.description: Name of the Lambda function.

parameter.name: description
parameter.description: The description of the function.

parameter.name: s3Bucket
parameter.description: S3 bucket name in the same AWS Region.

parameter.name: s3Key
parameter.description: The Amazon S3 key of the deployment package.

parameter.name: s3ObjectVersion
parameter.description: The version of the deployment package object to use for versioned objects.

parameter.name: zipFile
parameter.description: The base64-encoded contents of the deployment package.

parameter.name: targetArn
parameter.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an Amazon SQS queue or Amazon SNS topic.

parameter.name: environmentVariables
parameter.description: Environment variable key-value pairs.

parameter.name: handler
parameter.description: The name of the method within your code that Lambda calls to execute your function.

parameter.name: kmsKeyArn
parameter.description: The ARN of the AWS Key Management Service (AWS KMS) key that's used to encrypt your function's environment variables.

parameter.name: layers
parameter.description: A list of function layers to add to the function's execution environment. Specify each layer by its ARN, including the version.

parameter.name: memorySize
parameter.description: The amount of memory that your function has access to.

parameter.name: publish
parameter.description: Set to true to publish the first version of the function during creation.

parameter.name: role
parameter.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the function's execution role.

parameter.name: runtime
parameter.description: The identifier of the function's runtime.

parameter.name: tags
parameter.description: A list of tags to apply to the function.

parameter.name: timeout
parameter.description: The amount of time that Lambda allows a function to run before stopping it (max value is 900 seconds, default 3 seconds).

parameter.name: mode
parameter.description: The tracing mode.

parameter.name: securityGroupIds
parameter.description: A list of VPC security group IDs. It's an array of strings.

parameter.name: subnetIds
parameter.description: A list of VPC subnet IDs.
